title: MD
biography: Walter Jaoko is a Kenyan professor of medical microbiology and tropical medicine. He is a past Director of KAVI-Institute of Clinical Research (KAVI-ICR), a former Adjunct Professor at University of Alabama and a former Extraordinary Professor at the Centre for Bioethics and Law in the Department of Medicine at Stellenbosch University.
aiSummary: Walter Jaoko is a immunology specialist with an H-index of 45 at University of Nairobi (Member). Has been published in The Lancet Infectious Diseases, Nature Communications. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
